00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "XmlWriter"

00023 #include "xmlwriter.h"
00024 #include "xmlutils.h"
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Xml {
00027 
00028 string XmlWriter::serialize(bool withClassName, const Writable* w)
00029 {
00030     buffer = xmlBufferCreate();
00031     XML_CHECK_ERROR(!buffer, "Cannot create xmlBuffer", "");
00032 
00033     writer = xmlNewTextWriterMemory(buffer, 0);
00034     XML_CHECK_ERROR(!writer, "Cannot create xmlTextWriter", "");
00035 
00036     if (indent) {
00037         xmlTextWriterSetIndent(writer, 1);
00038         xmlTextWriterSetIndentString(writer, BAD_CAST XML_INDENTATION_STRING);
00039     }
00040     else {
00041         xmlTextWriterSetIndent(writer, 0);
00042     }
00043 
00044     int r;
00045     r = xmlTextWriterStartDocument(writer, 0, XML_ENCODING, 0);
00046     XML_CHECK_ERROR(r < 0, "Cannot start xml document", "");
00047 
00048     writeNs = true;
00049     writeObject(withClassName, w);
00050 
00051     xmlTextWriterEndDocument(writer);
00052     xmlTextWriterFlush(writer);
00053     string rs((const char*) buffer->content);
00054     xmlFreeTextWriter(writer);
00055     xmlBufferFree(buffer);
00056     return rs;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void XmlWriter::startWriting(cstr myClassName, unsigned char version) throw (WritingException)
00060 {
00061     xmlTextWriterStartElementNS(writer, XML_NAMESPACE_PREFIX, BAD_CAST "object",
00062         writeNs ? writeNs = false, XML_NAMESPACE_URI_ROOT : XML_NAMESPACE_URI);
00063     if (curObjectName != "") writeAttribute("name", curObjectName.c_str());
00064     writeAttribute("class", myClassName.c_str());
00065     char buf[16];
00066     sprintf(buf, "%d", version);
00067     if (version != 1) writeAttribute("version", buf);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void XmlWriter::write_u8(uint8_t v, cstr name) throw (WritingException)
00071 {
00072     startNamedElement("uint8", name);
00073         writeAttribute("value", vtos(v, XML_INTEGER_VALUE_PRINTF_FORMAT).c_str());
00074     endElement();
00075 }

00112 void XmlWriter::writeBytes(const void* buf, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException)
00113 {
00114     startNamedElement("buffer64", name);
00115         // we SHOULD use this function, if there were the 
00116         // xmlTextWriterWriteBase64(writer, (const char*) buf, 0, n);
00117         string s;
00118         encode64((const char*) buf, n, s, true);
00119         xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, BAD_CAST s.c_str());
00120     endElement();
00121 }
00122 
00123 void XmlWriter::write_i8(const int8_t* v, size_t n, cstr name) throw (WritingException)
00124 {
00125     startNamedElement("array", name);
00126         writeAttribute("type", "int8");
00127         writeAttribute("size", vtos(n, "%d").c_str());
00128         for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00129             xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString(writer, XML_INTEGER_VALUE_PRINTF_FORMAT, v[i]);
00130             if (i != n - 1) xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, BAD_CAST " ");
00131         }
00132     endElement();
00133 }
00134

00194 
00195 void XmlWriter::writeString(cstr s, cstr name) throw (WritingException)
00196 {
00197     startElement("string");
00198         writeAttribute("name", name.c_str());
00199         xmlChar* encstr = xmlEncode(s.c_str());
00200         xmlTextWriterWriteString(writer, encstr);
00201         xmlFree(encstr);
00202     endElement();
00203 }
00204 
00205 // NOTE: XmlWriter::writeObject writes ALWAYS the className of the object
00206 void XmlWriter::writeObject(bool /* see note above */, const Writable* w, cstr name) throw (WritingException)
00207 {
00208     curObjectName = name;
00209     w->write(this);
00210 }
00211 
00212 void XmlWriter::doneWriting() throw (WritingException)
00213 {
00214     xmlTextWriterEndElement(writer);
00215 }
00216 
00217 void XmlWriter::throwIt(cstr errorMessage) throw (WritingException)
00218 {
00219     throw WritingException(errorMessage);
00220 }
00221 
00222 }}} // namespace
